column4: hello, is it possible to setup cups print server which  brodcast some specific printer to each subnet, for example pritnter1 and printer2 for subnet 192.168.0.0/24, printer3 and printer4 for 192.168.1.0/24
i tried once, a few years ago. Back then, i could only get it to broadcast all printers to both subnets.
do you think that this possible now with new version?
